must be given in parameter because
property cannot be accessed through an extension or inside a method.
A picker allowing to expose several radio buttons and choose only one within the others.
Each radio button contains a “tag”, i.e. a supposed to be unique value.
The picker will expose the choosen value through this “tag”.
It has also some configuration elements which will override the one applied to nested
(divider, read only and error mode, layout and outlined)
must be given in parameter because
property cannot be accessed through an extension or inside a method.
Radio button item is a UI element that allows to select a single option from a set of mutually exclusive choices.
Radio button item covers a wider range of contexts by allowing to toggle the visibility of additional text labels and icon assets.
